319980.name: MAGIX Music Maker 2015
319980.description:
Drag & drop to create your own songs with MAGIX Music Maker 2015. You have complete control of all instruments and tools right from the start - no previous experience is required. Your equipment includes more than 3000 sounds & loops, two powerful synthesizers and a heavy-hitting drum machine with an 8-bit look.

MAGIX Music Maker lets you be a musician, singer or a producer. Immerse yourself in a world of hip hop, reggae, techno or rock and create your own song. Every sound has a different story - and you get to decide how that story is told.

Your basic equipment:

  • Drag, drop and arrange more than 3000 loops & sounds
  • Six different Soundpools from diverse genres
  • Urban Drums: A drum machine for Hip Hop & Dubstep
  • Analog Synths: A virtual synthesizer for an electronic sound
  • DN-e1 synthesizer for a high-quality synthetic sound
  • Up to 99 tracks for your own songs
  • Vocal Tune 2: Tuning for vocal recordings
  • Screen keyboard: Make music with your mouse
  • Professional studio effects & plug-ins
  • VST 2 support
  • Import projects from the free Music Maker Jam app
  • A ton of fun

Amazing effects You can individually adjust the loudness of each of 99 tracks and apply effects to any of them with the click of a mouse. From vintage to high-end effects: Take your sound to the next level.

New instruments

All the instruments in Music Maker 2015 can be played with the mouse, the screen keyboard or a USB keyboard.

Drum pads instead of game pads
Turn on the new Urban Drums virtual drum machine and find something to hold on to: These powerful drums are perfect for making Hip Hop and Dubstep beats.

The ultimate synthesizer
Unbeatable: The Analog Synths virtual instrument brings the sounds of legendary analog synthesizers back from the grave and unites them in one powerful package.

Individualize your sound
Become the hero of an entire generation: The Vita Sampler allows you to use sound files from games and other pieces of music to create your own instrument. Endlessly modifiable.
319980.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 荷兰语*, 芬兰语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 瑞典语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
